imdb.plot outline: A young girl's innocence is shattered by tragedies. Haunting her through adulthood, these events flip her life inside out and thrusts her headlong through the gateway of the underworld. Before she knows it, she's in too deep and must navigate her way through the depths of the underbelly, to the life she once dreamed of.
imdb.title: Sunshine
plot: A young girl's innocence is shattered by tragedies. Haunting her through adulthood, these events flip her life inside out and thrusts her headlong through the gateway of the underworld. Before she knows it, she's in too deep and must navigate her way through the depths of the underbelly, to the life she once dreamed of.::One Way Productions
